mapper.insert: insert into notice_board (b_writer_email, b_writer_name, b_title, b_content, b_write_date) values(#{bWriterEmail}, #{bWriterName}, #{bTitle}, #{bContent}, now())
mapper.select: select b_no as bNo, b_writer_email as bWriterEmail, b_writer_name as bWriterName,b_title as bTitle, b_content as bContent, b_hits as bHits, b_write_date as bWriteDate, b_modify_date as bModifyDate from notice_board order by b_no desc limit #{start}, #{end}

select b_no as bNo, b_writer_email as bWriterEmail, b_writer_name as bWriterName,b_title as bTitle, b_content as bContent, b_hits as bHits, b_write_date as bWriteDate, b_modify_date as bModifyDate from notice_board where b_no=#{bNo}
mapper.update: update notice_board set b_writer_email = #{bWriterEmail}, b_writer_name = #{bWriterName}, b_title = #{bTitle}, b_content = #{bContent}, b_modify_date = now() where b_no=#{bNo}
